# element

**Type Property**

The user interface element for the annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
static let element: NSAccessibility.AnnotationAttributeKey
```

## Keys

- **label**: A description of the annotation.
- **location**: The position where the annotation applies.

items.description: The position where the annotation applies.
items.name: location
